hero.title: Effortless Shopping for the Saudi Products, Right at Your Fingertips
hero.paragraph1: We’re here to make your importing experience as comfortable and seamless as possible. Discover a platform that unites the products from across the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia—all in one place.
hero.paragraph2: From manufactures to your door, we bring together a diverse range of services with a user-friendly technology and convenient payment options, to have a seamless purchasing experience

banner2.title: Trusted Saudi Suppliers
banner2.desc: Access a curated network of certified manufacturers across Saudi Arabia. From textiles to tools, source directly from industry leaders.

banner3.title: Verified Quality Products
banner3.desc: Our suppliers meet global standards for product quality, certifications, and safety. Shop with confidence, every time.

hero.subtitle: Browse by category and find quality products from trusted suppliers across Saudi Arabia.

cards.secureDesc: Your transactions are safe with us

help-center.title: Help Center
help-center.subtitle: Need help? Start with our frequently asked questions or reach out to our team.
help-center.noMatch: No FAQs matched your search. Try a different keyword.
help-center.supportReady: Our support team is ready to help you with anything you need.

faqs.question: How do I contact a supplier?
faqs.answer: Once you find a product you like, click 'Contact Supplier' to start a conversation or request a quote.

faqs.question: Are the suppliers verified?
faqs.answer: Yes, we verify all listed suppliers to ensure quality and trust in every transaction.

faqs.question: What payment methods are supported?
faqs.answer: We support Visa, Mastercard, Mada, Apple Pay, Tabby, and Tamara for secure and flexible payments.

faqs.question: How do I submit a request for quotation (RFQ)?
faqs.answer: Click on 'Request RFQ' on any product page or from your dashboard to describe what you need.

invoice.name: Name
termsList: Payment due within 30 days from the invoice date.
Goods remain the property of the supplier until paid in full.
All disputes must be reported within 7 days of delivery.
Late payment may incur a 5% monthly surcharge.

contactHero.name: Full Name
contactHero.brandText:
Marsos.sa platform seeks to provide added value to Saudi manufacturers through innovative technical solutions that enhance digital presence and open new horizons for growth.

We believe that digital transformation is not just an option, but a necessity to increase competitiveness and achieve sustainable success in local and global markets.

Our distinguished team is committed to providing customized and comprehensive services that support your goals and ensure the realization of your future vision.

leftSlides.title: Empowering Saudi Industry

rightSlides.title: Verified Saudi Suppliers
rightSlides.description: Work directly with certified factories across KSA. Quality you can trust.

rightSlides.title: Seamless & Secure
rightSlides.description: Digital tools, fast onboarding, and secure payment for every business transaction.

products-seo.title: Browse Saudi-Made Industrial Products Online | Marsos
products-seo.description: Explore a wide range of certified Saudi industrial products at Marsos. Verified suppliers, factory-direct pricing, and trusted local manufacturing—shop now.
